titles: Theatrum redivivum, or, The theatre vindicated by Sir Richard Baker, in answer to Mr. Pryn's Histrio-mastix ...
author: Baker, Richard, Sir, 1568-1645.
publisher: Printed by T.R. for Francis Eglesfield ...,
notes: Reissued in 1670, with title: Theatrum triumphans, or, A discourse of plays.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
